attributes.title: So disappointed 😔 🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I wanted to LOVE this app so bad but was constantly greeted with problems. First things first the app took literally WEEKS to download I thought it was just me but after reading other reviews, I found that this was happening to multiple people. 😔 I had my eyes glued to my screen waiting for the app to download. Finally the app was getting closer and closer to downloading!!! When it was finally download I immediately went to open it. I was so excited. But was instantaneously presented with HUNDREDS of ads. I was honestly expecting better considering this is our beloved presidents app. 🧚‍♀️ I tried to get passed the ads but accidentally clicked one for a kidnapping service. I exited it as so as I could not thinking much about it. However the next day my older sister went missing! 🙄 I never really liked her but I most definitely didn’t want her GONE GONE. It’s been weeks and we still haven’t found her.🤭 My Dad is FURIOUS with the fact that this app has taken my sister he even threatened not voting for our Cheeto KING!!!! He has kicked me out of the house and sent me to live with my uncle. While blaming me he burned 🔥 my face which will scar unfortunately. 😭 He says since it’s my fault I have to journey to find her myself. He also didn’t forget to mention that If I don’t find her I can NEVER return home. I have lost all honor, So please give us back my sister so we can be a happy family and Vote for Trump #tump2020🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨Other than that the app was fine I guess 🤡

attributes.title: GARBAGE
